alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 2:43PM CDT until August 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Bradley, Hamilton and Polk. * WHEN...Until 445 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 342 PM EDT, Minor flooding will continue in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chattanooga, Ridgeside, South Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale, Flint Springs, Red Clay State Park, Waterville, Apison, Gap Springs, Ooltewah, East Brainerd, Conasauga, Parksville, East Ridge, Big Frog Mountain and Lookout Mountain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
